list.abs: ...，从广场方向过来，加建了一道拱券廊和一个围廊院子。这是基于罗马角斗场以及马塞勒斯剧场的柱-拱结构的“赐福廊”（benediction loggia）。角斗场和这个剧场都是圣彼得大教堂前设计更大凉廊的基础。

entry.def: A loggia is a roofed area attached to a house.

means.word_mean: 1. a roofed arcade or gallery with open sides stretching along the front or side of a building; often at an upper level
